name: df-cls
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ccl, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), cint(crab(s2, cfv(ccld, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define a function on topologies whose value is the closure function on the subsets of the base set. See ~ clsval . (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-2006.)
